input.activity_signal: FCC Form 499 database shows "No Longer Active as of 5/22/2021. This company still exists, however it is no longer providing telecommunications services." Additionally, web search results indicate the company faced legal issues including FCC enforcement for illegal robocall traffic and consumer lawsuits for unauthorized telemarketing calls.
input.product_summary: Yodel Technologies provided call center services using AI-powered soundboard technology that used audio snippets of prerecorded voices to increase agent efficiency and productivity in telemarketing operations.
